title: Elon Musk calls Spanish PM 'dirty Sanchez' for proposing social media ban for minors
summary_full: Elon Musk has fiercely criticized Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez's proposal to ban social media for children under 16. Sanchez aims to protect minors from online harms, likening the digital space to a "wild west." This move aligns with a broader European trend towards stricter tech regulations for young users.
